text: Ani sarvasrestha allahaneca tumha sarvanna nirmana kele ahe. Toca nantara tumhala mrtyu de'ila, ani tumacyata kahi asehi aheta je atisaya va'ita vaya (khupa mhataravaya) kade paratavile jatata, ki khupa kahi januna ghetalyanantarahi na janave. Nihsansaya sarvasrestha allaha sarva kahi jananara ani samarthya rakhanara ahe
